    • Method Detail

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns the URL to play (download) or record (upload) the content for the RepositoryItem. When the first client connect to this URL, the HttpSessionStartedEvent will be fired to registered listeners.
        Specified by:
        getURL in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        the URL to play or record

      • getDispatchURL

        public java.lang.String getDispatchURL()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns the URL to play (download) or record (upload) the content for the RepositoryItem. This URL is relative to the context URL of this app. The URL can be used to dispatch a request with getRequestDispatcher. When the first client connect to this URL, the HttpSessionStartedEvent will be fired to registered listeners.
        Specified by:
        getDispatchURL in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        the relative URL to play or record

      • setAutoTerminationTimeout

        public void setAutoTerminationTimeout(long timeoutInMillis)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Sets the time of inactivity to auto-terminate this element. The timer is started when finish the last request to download or upload the media.
        Specified by:
        setAutoTerminationTimeout in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint

      • getAutoTerminationTimeout

        public long getAutoTerminationTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Gets the current auto-termination timeout
        Specified by:
        getAutoTerminationTimeout in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        the timeout in millis
        See Also:
        RepositoryHttpEndpoint.setAutoTerminationTimeout(long)

      • addSessionStartedListener

        public void addSessionStartedListener(RepositoryHttpEventListener<HttpSessionStartedEvent> listener)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Adds the RepositoryHttpEventListener< HttpSessionStartedEvent> to this RepositoryHttpEndpoint. When the media is requested, a HttpSessionStartedEvent will be fired to all registered listeners and the method onEvent will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        addSessionStartedListener in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint

      • addSessionTerminatedListener

        public void addSessionTerminatedListener(RepositoryHttpEventListener<HttpSessionTerminatedEvent> listener)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Adds the RepositoryHttpEventListener< HttpSessionTerminatedEvent> to this RepositoryHttpEndpoint. When the RepositoryHttpEndpoint.stop() method is invoked or a configurable inactivity time is reached (configurable using RepositoryHttpEndpoint.setAutoTerminationTimeout(long)) a HttpSessionTerminatedEvent will be fired to all registered listeners and the method onEvent will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        addSessionTerminatedListener in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint

      • addSessionErrorListener

        public void addSessionErrorListener(RepositoryHttpEventListener<HttpSessionErrorEvent> listener)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Adds the RepositoryHttpEventListener< HttpSessionErrorEvent> to this RepositoryHttpEndpoint. When an error is produced reading or writing the media from/to repository a HttpSessionErrorEvent will be fired to all registered listeners and the method onEvent will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        addSessionErrorListener in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint

      • fireStartedEventIfFirstTime

        public void fireStartedEventIfFirstTime()

      • fireSessionTerminatedEvent

        public void fireSessionTerminatedEvent()

      • getRepositoryItem

        public RepositoryItem getRepositoryItem()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns the associated repository item of this RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Specified by:
        getRepositoryItem in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        The repository item associated to the endpoint

      • createRepoItemInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream createRepoItemInputStream()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns a new InputStream on each invocation. It is legal to read from multiple threads to the same repositoryItem. The returned InputStream fully supports skip. The receiver of the InputStream is responsible for closing it after its use.
        Specified by:
        createRepoItemInputStream in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        An input stream to read item content

      • getRepoItemOutputStream

        public java.io.OutputStream getRepoItemOutputStream()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns the OutputStream associated with this RepositoryHttpEndpoint. The first time, the OutputStream is created and the next times the same OutputStream is returned. The returned OutputStream is not designed to be used concurrently from several threads. The OutputStream is closed when the RepositoryHttpEndpoint.stop() is invoked or the timeout RepositoryHttpEndpoint.getAutoTerminationTimeout() is reached.
        Specified by:
        getRepoItemOutputStream in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        Returns:
        An output stream to write item content

        public long getWrittenBytes()

        public void forceStopHttpManager(java.lang.String message)

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryHttpEndpoint
        This method is called to finish the current session. The URL become invalid to download or upload content and the HttpSessionTerminatedEvent is fired to registered listeners.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface RepositoryHttpEndpoint
